item.title: 电子产品消费疲软，百思买销售额将连续第十个季度下滑
item.description: 本周四，美国电子产品零售商百思买（Best Buy）将公布季度业绩，销售额将连续第十个季度下滑。【原文：Best Buy is set to post its tenth consecutive quarter of sales decline on Thursday when the U.S. electronics retailer reports quarterly results, as spending on big-ticket electronics remains pressured despite easing inflation.】

item.title: 消息人士称，汽车电池制造商将在下周举行的听证会上对抗欧盟卡特尔指控
item.description: 据直接知情人士周三透露，在下周举行的非公开听证会上，一批汽车起动机电池制造商将对欧盟关于卡特尔操纵电池价格的指控提出质疑。【原文：A group of car starter battery makers will contest European Union accusations of operating a cartel to fix battery prices at a closed hearing next week, people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Stellantis 首席执行官称，电动汽车转型将成为汽车供应商的 "沉重负担
item.description: Stellantis 公司首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）周三表示，随着汽车行业竞相削减成本，向电动汽车的过渡也将给汽车供应商带来 "沉重负担"。【原文：Stellantis Chief Executive Carlos Tavares said on Wednesday the transition to electric mobility would involve a "significant burden" also for auto suppliers, as the industry races to cut costs.】

item.title: 以色列航空公司利润飙升，首席执行官敦促外国航空公司恢复以色列航班
item.description: 在外国航空公司因与巴勒斯坦激进组织哈马斯的冲突而停止或减少飞往以色列的航班之际，以色列艾尔航空公司（El Al Israel Airlines）周三实现了第一季度盈利，这主要得益于强劲的需求。【原文：El Al Israel Airlines on Wednesday swung to a first-quarter profit, boosted by strong demand at a time when foreign carriers have halted or curtailed flights to Israel because of the conflict with Palestinian militant group Hamas.】

item.title: 美国称8.4万辆老款日产汽车因气囊召回未修复而停驶
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，近 8.4 万辆日产汽车上的高田气囊已被召回，但尚未修复，车主应立即停止驾驶这些汽车。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said Wednesday that owners of nearly 84,000 older Nissan vehicles equipped with recalled, unrepaired Takata air bags should immediately stop driving them.】

item.title: 拜登政府扩大风能和太阳能以外的税收抵免范围
item.description: 拜登政府周三提议扩大多年来一直推动美国太阳能和风能项目的税收减免范围，以涵盖包括核裂变和核聚变在内的更广泛的清洁能源技术。【原文：The Biden administration on Wednesday proposed expanding tax credits that have for years boosted U.S. solar and wind energy projects to cover a wider range of clean energy technologies including nuclear fission and fusion.】

item.title: 消息人士称，壳牌和埃克森即将达成向维亚罗出售北海资产的协议
item.description: 三位行业和银行消息人士称，壳牌和埃克森美孚即将达成协议，将其在北海南部共同拥有的天然气田出售给英国独立生产商 Viaro Energy。【原文：Shell and Exxon Mobil are nearing an agreement to sell their jointly-owned gas fields in the southern North Sea to independent British producer Viaro Energy, three industry and banking sources said.】

item.title: 萨瓦德尔首席执行官排除了针对 BBVA 收购的并购防御措施
item.description: 西班牙萨瓦德尔银行（Sabadell）首席执行官 Cesar Gonzalez-Bueno 告诉路透社记者，该公司并不打算尝试收购竞争对手，作为抵御竞争对手 BBVA 恶意收购的潜在策略的一部分。【原文：Spain's Sabadell is not planning to try and buy a competitor as part of a potential defence strategy against rival BBVA's hostile takeover attempt, Chief Executive Officer Cesar Gonzalez-Bueno told Reuters.】

item.title: 德国 5 月通胀率升至 2.8%
item.description: 德国联邦统计局周三公布的初步数据显示，5月份德国通胀率略高于预期，达到2.8%。【原文：German inflation rose slightly more than expected to 2.8% in May, preliminary data from the federal statistics office showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 汇丰银行完成向 Expobank 出售俄罗斯业务部门的交易
item.description: 汇丰银行和 Expobank 两家贷款机构周三表示，已将其俄罗斯分行的所有权转让给 Expobank，转让费未披露，结束了约两年的谈判和不确定性。【原文：HSBC has transferred ownership of its Russian unit to Expobank for an undisclosed fee, the two lenders said on Wednesday, ending around two years of negotiations and uncertainty.】

item.title: Abercrombie & Fitch上调年销售额增长预期，原因是需求恢复强劲
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch 周三上调了年销售额增长预期，第一季度业绩超出预期，该公司寄希望于新潮服装和配饰来拉动旗下 Abercrombie 和 Hollister 品牌的需求。【原文：Abercrombie & Fitch raised its annual sales growth forecast and beat estimates for first-quarter results on Wednesday, betting on new and trendy apparel and accessories to drive demand at its Abercrombie and Hollister brands.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，贝莱德 ETF 成为全球最大的比特币基金
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三报道，贝莱德的 iShares 比特币信托基金已成为全球最大的原始加密货币基金，自年初在美国上市以来已积累了近 200 亿美元的总资产。【原文：BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust has become the world's largest fund for the original cryptocurrency, racking up nearly $20 billion in total assets since listing in the U.S. at the start of the year, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Aethon Energy 将以 2.6 亿美元收购 Tellurian 上游资产
item.description: Aethon Energy 公司周三表示，将以 2.6 亿美元的价格收购 Tellurian 的上游资产，并从其 Driftwood LNG 工厂购买每年 200 万吨的液化天然气 (LNG)。【原文：Aethon Energy will acquire Tellurian's upstream assets for $260 million and purchase two million tons per annum (mtpa) of liquefied natural gas (LNG) from its Driftwood LNG plant, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国航空公司第二季度盈利预期下调，拖累其他航空公司股价下挫
item.description: 美国航空公司周三股价暴跌，原因是该公司下调了本季度的利润预期，尽管预计夏季旅游需求将创下新高，但该公司的定价能力却在减弱。【原文：Shares of American Airlines slumped on Wednesday after the carrier cut its profit forecast for the current quarter, citing weakening pricing power despite expectations for record travel demand in the summer season.】

item.title: 默克将以最高 30 亿美元收购眼科药物公司 EyeBio
item.description: 默克公司周三表示，将以不超过 30 亿美元的价格收购眼科疾病药物开发商 EyeBio，这是这家美国制药商为促进增长而进行的最新一次收购。【原文：Merck said on Wednesday it would acquire eye disease drug developer EyeBio for up to $3 billion, in the latest acquisition by the U.S. drugmaker as it looks to boost growth.】

item.title: 加拿大国家银行利润因财富管理和市场走强而增长
item.description: 加拿大国家银行周三公布第二季度净利润增长，得益于财富管理和金融市场部门的强劲表现。【原文：National Bank of Canada reported a rise in second-quarter net profit on Wednesday, helped by strong performance in its wealth management and financial markets units.】

item.title: 利率忧虑推高债券收益率，期货下跌
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货下滑，由于担心美联储降息的时机，国债收益率不断攀升，令大型股承压。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Wednesday, as megacap stocks were pressured by rising Treasury yields on concerns around the timing of the Federal Reserve's interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 加拿大 BMO 银行第二季度利润因美国业务疲软而下降
item.description: 加拿大 BMO 金融集团（BMO Financial Group）周三公布，受美国业务疲软的影响，第二季度调整后利润下降。【原文：Canadian lender BMO Financial Group reported a fall in second-quarter adjusted profit on Wednesday, hurt by weakness in its U.S. business.】

item.title: 早间竞标：消费者保持乐观，美联储陷入困境
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 德国三个州通胀率上升，表明全国通胀率略有上升
item.description: 初步数据显示，5 月份德国三个州的通胀率略有上升，这表明欧洲最大经济体的全国通胀率可能会略有上升，尽管有一个州的物价增长确实有所下降。【原文：Inflation in three German states inched up in May, preliminary data showed, suggesting that national inflation in Europe's biggest economy may rise slightly, although price growth did decline in one state.】

item.title: 中国吉利将推出配备更省油发动机的混合动力车
item.description: 中国吉利控股集团（GEELY.UL）周三表示，将在明年上半年推出一系列混合动力车型，配备下一代更省油的发动机。【原文：China's Geely Holding Group (GEELY.UL) on Wednesday said it would launch a series of hybrid models in the first half of next year equipped with its next-generation, more fuel-efficient engine.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：普华永道将成为 OpenAI 最大的企业客户
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，作为新协议的一部分，会计巨头普华永道将成为人工智能初创公司 OpenAI 企业产品的最大客户和首家经销商。【原文：Accounting giant PWC will become the largest customer and first reseller of artificial intelligence startup OpenAI's enterprise product, as part of a new deal, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称，如果美国拖后腿，欧盟应推迟实施部分银行规则
item.description: 欧洲央行决策者弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）周三表示，如果美国在全面实施《巴塞尔协议 III》规则方面拖得太久，欧盟 "可以而且应该 "推迟实施某些银行资本规则。【原文：The European Union "could and should" delay the implementation of certain bank capital rules if the U.S. drags its feet too long on fully implementing the Basel III rules, ECB policymaker Francois Villeroy de Galhau said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 电动汽车关税迫在眉睫，中国准备与欧洲达成协议
item.description: 欧盟委员会预计将对中国电动汽车加征关税，这将为一轮谈判拉开序幕，中国企业高管希望这将减轻对全球最大电动汽车产业的打击。【原文：The European Commission's expected move to hike tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles is set to kick off a round of talks that Chinese executives hope will soften the blow for the world's biggest EV industry.】

item.title: 波音公司与消防员工会达成临时合同协议
item.description: 波音公司和代表其约 125 名消防员的工会在一份联合声明中表示，他们已于周三达成一项临时合同协议。【原文：Boeing and a union representing about 125 of its firefighters said Wednesday they had reached a tentative contract deal, the planemaker and union said in a joint statement.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast 考虑推迟投资 40 亿美元在美国建厂
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast 正在考虑进一步推迟在北卡罗来纳州投资 40 亿美元建厂的计划，因为这家亏损企业正努力争取美国消费者的青睐。【原文：Vietnamese electric car maker VinFast is looking at further delaying a planned $4 billion factory in North Carolina, a person briefed on the matter said, as the loss-making company struggles to gain favour with U.S. consumers.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，康菲石油公司收购马拉松石油公司的谈判已进入后期阶段
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道称，康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）正在就收购马拉松石油公司（Marathon Oil）进行深入谈判，这笔全股票交易对这家总部位于休斯顿的公司的估值可能略高于其 150 亿美元的市值。【原文：ConocoPhillips is in advanced talks to buy Marathon Oil in an all-stock deal that could value the Houston-based company at a little over its $15 billion market value, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday citing people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 必和必拓提出社会经济措施以缓解英美资源集团对 490 亿美元竞购的担忧
item.description: 必和必拓集团周三表示，它已提出一系列社会经济措施，以消除英美资源集团对其386亿英镑（492.0亿美元）收购要约的担忧，并表示它认为英美资源集团需要更多时间进一步参与其提案。【原文：BHP Group said on Wednesday it had proposed a range of socioeconomic measures to address the concerns of Anglo American over its 38.6 billion pounds ($49.20 billion) offer, and that it believes it needs more time to further engage on its proposal.】

item.title: Uber 将在奥运高峰期提供塞纳河游船和巴黎一日游服务
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）周三推出了一系列措施，包括合作在塞纳河上提供游船服务，以满足即将在巴黎举行的奥运会所带来的爆炸性需求。【原文：Uber Technologies unveiled a raft of measures on Wednesday, including a tie-up to offer cruises on the Seine river as it looks to meet explosive demand stemming from the upcoming Olympics in Paris.】

item.title: 在市场中：在亚洲，人们会问，如何从美国脱险？
item.description: 上周，香港的一位欧洲私人财富经理告诉我，他最近获得了一个台湾亿万富翁账户所需的催化剂：地缘政治。【原文：A European private wealth manager in Hong Kong told me last week he recently got the catalyst he needed to land a Taiwanese billionaire's account: geopolitics.】
